plot: Rabbit and Wolf don't get along, and want their children to do the same. The children have other plans, and this makes their parents livid.
plot_en: Rabbit and Wolf don't get along, and want their children to do the same. The children have other plans, and this makes their parents livid.
plot_es: Rabbit and Wolf don't get along, and want their children to do the same. The children have other plans, and this makes their parents livid.
title: Don't Eat the Neighbours
